EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder to Attend: Executive luncheon series - Telecommunications
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Reminder! You're registered to attend the Executive luncheon series - Telecommunications on Wednesday 8th October 2014.
Dear {{lead.First Name}},
This is to confirm your attendance for the upcoming Executive luncheon series - Telecommunications in Melbourne on Wednesday 8th October 2014.
Live Event: Executive luncheon series - Telecommunications Date: Wednesday 8th October 2014 Time: 12.15 for registration with 12.30pm start â€“ 2.30pm Location: Bistro Guillaume, Crown Entertainment Complex, Southbank <https://www.google.com.au/maps/place/Bistro+Guillaume/@-37.822222,144.959408,17z/data=!3m2!4b1!5s0x6ad65d5313979139:0xe757f1ac09b3de55!4m2!3m1!1s0x6ad65d532236e4b3:0x54b39936ab612a90> Add to Calendar <http://connect.pivotal.io/rs/pivotal/images/APJ_Event_Telco Luncheon Series_Q314 _Melbourne.ics>
We look forward to seeing you in Melbourne on Wednesday 8th October 2014.
Sincerely, The Pivotal Team
